CustomField.formula: IF(OR((CloseDate >= (TODAY() - 365*2)), (msf_TypeFundraisingContribution__c = 'D' && CloseDate >= (TODAY() - 365*5)), (CloseDate <= (TODAY() - 365*2) && CloseDate >= (TODAY() - 365*5) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Recurrent Donation')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Historical')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, 'Membership'))) ), true, false)
